consent.title: Informed Consent Agreement
consent.generalNotice: By continuing, you consent to the use of your data according to our policies.
consent.phipaNotice: This consent aligns with Ontario's PHIPA regulations regarding health information protection.
consent.pipedaNotice: This consent aligns with federal PIPEDA requirements for personal data use.
consent.agree: I have read and agree to the consent terms.
consent.confirmation: Your consent has been recorded successfully.

notifications.accountUpdated: Your account information was successfully updated.
notifications.sessionExpired: Your session has expired. Please log in again.
notifications.newMessage: You have a new clinical message.

emails.welcomeBody: Thank you for joining AiDuxCare. We're excited to help streamline your clinical notes.
emails.alertBody: A new clinical alert has been generated in your account.

soap.default: Summarize this session into SOAP format.
soap.tone.formal: Generate a structured and professional SOAP note.
soap.role.physio: Produce a SOAP note emphasizing physical assessment findings.
soap.role.assistant: Create a concise progress note based on the assistant's observations.

consent.default: Explain the informed consent process in clear terms.

audit.default: Provide an audit summary for clinical compliance verification.
